      EIKO-H11BCVSUBP1

      H11B Headlight - ClearVision Supreme - 55 Watt - T3.25

      Shielded - 13.2 Volt - Eiko H11BCVSU-BP

      With SoLux technology, the Eiko H11BCVSU-BP ClearVision Supreme halogen headlight bulb illuminates the night with the same bright white light as the sun. The high-quality 55-watt lamp features a CC-8 filament shining at an impressive 1345 lumens. Designed to outshine and outlast your stock headlights, the T3.25 halogen bulb delivers a longer, more vivid beam of light for better front and peripheral coverage. The right axial prefocus, H11B (PGJY19-2) base makes it easy to replace similar bulbs on any vehicle with an H11B (PGJY19-2) headlight plug. With a filament lifespan of 1000 hours, this automotive headlight bulb will last for many miles and is suitable for all kinds of weather.

      EIKO-H11BCVSUBP1
